item.description:
1. Vail, Keystone, Breckenridge ski resorts announce 2024 opening dates  The Denver Post
  2. Vail, Beaver Creek announce Opening Days for 2024-25 season  Vail Daily
  3. Breckenridge, Keystone resorts announce Opening Days for 2024-25 winter season  Summit Daily
  4. Dreaming of winter? Here's when Tahoe ski resorts open for the season  KCRA Sacramento
  5. Northstar, Heavenly, Kirkwood announce Opening Day for 2024-25 season  Tahoe Daily Tribune
